column1: Belonging to the poorest family of Feralas ; this persistant archaeologist campaigns to destroy their future.
Living with his brother in Eastern Plaguelands ; this tolerant soldier spares no effort to to learn the truth about their ego.
Hailing from Maelstrom ; this disloyal bar owner aims to learn the truth about their family.
Belonging to the poorest family of Tirisfal Glades ; this relentless cleaner plans to destroy their ego.
Originally born in  Western Plaguelands ; this murderous Blood Elf fights to forsake their future.
Heir to the throne of The Broken Isles ; this loyal Priest is looking  to unearth their origins.
Ran away from  Krokuun ; this rude auctioneer aspires to unearth their destiny.
Living with his mother in Crystalsong Forest ; this dominant miner seeks to forsake their family.
Grew up in Bogpaddle ; this relentless alchemist fights to conquer their destiny.
With origins unknown but ending up in  Durotar ; this obnoxious enchanter wishes to profit from their origins.
Grew up in Dread Wastes ; this caustic salesperson ventures to unearth their destiny.
Raised in Westfall ; this bold mid-class aspires to forsake their future.
